detail_desc: Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and a deep opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, zip at the back and long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Lined.
Fitted body in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a raw-edge hem.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, fake welt pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, ribbed neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and a seam with a flounced skirt at the hem. Lightly brushed inside.
Cap in cotton corduroy with a contrasting colour peak and appliqué. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Trainers in mesh with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined, off-the-shoulder swimsuit with padded cups, removable inserts and elasticated, gathered frills at the top. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in patterned organic cotton. Dress with narrow shoulder straps and flare to the hem. Pants with elastication at the waist and hems.
Sports top in fast-drying, functional fabric with a small V-neck at the front with decorative straps and short cap sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Knee-length coat in a wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal welt front pockets and a high-cut back vent. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket washed cotton denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and braces with an adjustable fastening at the front.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short cap sleeves, a visible seam down the back and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Striped soft toy in a cotton weave with embroidered details. Length approx. 17.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a button placket, open chest pocket and rounded hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Rib-trimmed, jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length sports trousers in fast-drying, marled functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves.

Lightly padded, satin baseball jacket with imitation leather sleeves and a ribbed stand-up collar. Press-studs down the front, welt side pockets and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a polyester filling. Lined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Soft, non-wired, mesh triangle bra with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in fabric with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a small loop at the back. Patterned soles with a good grip.
Short turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with long raglan sleeves. Decorative sewn-on, fine-knit trims down the front and sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with cap sleeves and a rounded hem.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, frill details at the front and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey underdress.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, appliqués and a motif. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shopper in supple imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 17x28x32.5 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Pull-on shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Diagonal seam at the front and decorative stitching on the legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Block-coloured jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with long, raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Oversized dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a patch front pocket. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal, zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Joggers in soft, lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication, a small frill trim and decorative drawstring at the waist. Small embroidery detail in glittery thread at the top, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle on the flap, an inner pocket and a metal chain shoulder strap. Size 4x15x17 cm.
Trousers in woven fabric with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Wide waist belt in sturdy fabric with a covered, rectangular buckle. Width 6.5 cm.
Fitted jumper in a soft, airy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar and long sleeves.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood and concealed zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, overlocked edges and ties with metal decorations.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringe trims. Size 100x200 cm.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front and a lined hood with a collar and elastic drawstring. Zipped front pockets, a zipped inner pocket, inner ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Lace T-shirt bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Knee-length jacket in a patterned viscose weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
V-neck top in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Narrow shoulder straps and pompom trims at the top and down the front.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Body in lace and mesh with a deep V-neck at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a lined gusset and string back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Alice band in grained imitation leather with a knot detail on the top.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
